## Cota racial

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

# data <- clipr::read_clip_tbl()
# 
# data <- data %>%
#   mutate(
#     Percentual.cota = readr::parse_number(Percentual.cota, locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","))
#   )

# Salvar data em um pasta local

# write_csv(data, "data/data.csv")

# subdata <- clipr::read_clip_tbl()
# 
# subdata <- subdata %>%
#   mutate(
#     Percentual.cota = readr::parse_number(Percentual.cota, locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","))
#   )

# Salvar data em um pasta local

# write_csv(data, "data/subdata.csv")

# write_csv(subdata, "data/subdata.csv")

data <- read_csv("data/data.csv") 

subdata <- read_csv("data/subdata.csv")

data <- data  |> 
 select(NO_ORGAO, NO_CARGO, GR_MAT, COTA, Percentual.cota)  

subdata <- subdata |> 
  select(NO_ORGAO, NO_CARGO, GR_MAT, COTA, Percentual.cota)

tbl <- reactable(
  data,
  elementId = "cars-download-table",
  pagination = TRUE,
  searchable =  TRUE,
  defaultSorted = "Percentual.cota",
  defaultColDef = colDef(headerClass = "header", align = "left"),
  columns = list(
    NO_ORGAO = colDef(
      name = "Órgão",
      width = 150
    ),
    NO_CARGO = colDef(name="", maxWidth=130, align="left"),
    GR_MAT = colDef(
      name = "Total de Servidores",
      defaultSortOrder = "desc",
      cell = function(value) {
        width <- paste0(value * 100 / max(data$followers), "%")
        value <- format(value, big.mark = ",")
        value <- format(value, width = 9, justify = "right")
        bar <- div(
          class = "bar-chart",
          style = list(marginRight = "0.375rem"),
          div(class = "bar", style = list(width = width, backgroundColor = "#3fc1c9"))
        )
        div(class = "bar-cell", span(class = "number", value), bar)
      }
    ),
    Percentual.cota = colDef(
      name = "% Cota Racial",
      defaultSortOrder = "desc",
      cell = JS('function(cellInfo) {
        // Format as percentage
        const pct = (cellInfo.value * 100).toFixed(1) + "%"
        // Pad single-digit numbers
        let value = pct.padStart(5)
        // Show % on first row only
        if (cellInfo.viewIndex > 0) {
          value = value.replace("%", " ")
        }
        // Render bar chart
        return `
          <div class="bar-cell">
            <span class="number">${value}</span>
            <div class="bar-chart" style="background-color: #e1e1e1">
              <div class="bar" style="width: ${pct}; background-color: #fc5185"></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        `
      }'),
      html = TRUE
    )
  ),
  compact = TRUE,
  class = "followers-tbl",
  
    #Sub-Table
  details = function(index){
    new = subdata[subdata$NO_ORGAO == data$NO_ORGAO[index],]
    reactable(data=new,
              defaultSorted = "Percentual.cota",
              defaultColDef = colDef(headerClass = "header", align = "left"),
              columns = list(
                NO_ORGAO = colDef(
                  name = "Órgão",
                  width = 150
                ),
                NO_CARGO = colDef(name="Cargo", maxWidth=130, align="left"),
                GR_MAT = colDef(
                  name = "Total de Servidores",
                  defaultSortOrder = "desc",
                  cell = function(value) {
                    width <- paste0(value * 100 / max(data$followers), "%")
                    value <- format(value, big.mark = ",")
                    value <- format(value, width = 9, justify = "right")
                    bar <- div(
                      class = "bar-chart",
                      style = list(marginRight = "0.375rem"),
                      div(class = "bar", style = list(width = width, backgroundColor = "#3fc1c9"))
                    )
                    div(class = "bar-cell", span(class = "number", value), bar)
                  }
                ),
                Percentual.cota = colDef(
                  name = "% Cota Racial",
                  defaultSortOrder = "desc",
                  cell = JS('function(cellInfo) {
        // Format as percentage
        const pct = (cellInfo.value * 100).toFixed(1) + "%"
        // Pad single-digit numbers
        let value = pct.padStart(5)
        // Show % on first row only
        if (cellInfo.viewIndex > 0) {
          value = value.replace("%", " ")
        }
        // Render bar chart
        return `
          <div class="bar-cell">
            <span class="number">${value}</span>
            <div class="bar-chart" style="background-color: #e1e1e1">
              <div class="bar" style="width: ${pct}; background-color: #fc5185"></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        `
      }'),
      html = TRUE
                )
              ),
      compact = TRUE,
      class = "followers-tbl"
      
    )
  }
)

htmltools::browsable(
  tagList(
    tags$button(
      tagList(fontawesome::fa("download"), "Download as CSV"),
      onclick = "Reactable.downloadDataCSV('cars-download-table', 'cars.csv')"
    ),
    
    div(class = "twitter-followers",
        div(class = "followers-header",
            h2(class = "followers-title", "Inclusão Racial no Serviço Público Federal: Análise das Cotas Raciais nos Concursos"),
            "Percentual de Ingresso de Servidores Públicos Federais por Meio de Cotas Raciais"
        ),
        tbl
    )
  )
)
```
